Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your order. At the time of your purchase, you elected to name your own Registered Agent. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order.
Next steps:
• Do not make any changes to the attached document as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support. • Print one (1) copy of the document on white paper using black ink. Please do not use color ink. • Your designated Registered Agent must sign where indicated, on the top half of the attached document. Please use black ink only. Please do not sign the bottom half of the document. Please leave the bottom half blank. • Mail the documents to our address listed below.
Courier Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd. 10th Flr. Glendale, CA 91203
USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd., 10th Flr. POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91203
• Alternatively, you can fax the signed documents to (323) 962-4521. Please include your name and order number on the fax coversheet to ensure proper routing of your document to our processing team.
• Did you know that LegalZoom also offers a Registered Agent service? The fee is $159 annually. If you prefer to use LegalZoom as your Registered Agent, please contact our Business Sales Department at (888) 381-8758.
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our Customer Support at (800) 773-0888 or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
